title: Demo
content:
Hugo Quiz Here is a simple example of a quiz, written in markdown using hugo shortcodes
Quiz header .quiz fieldset { border-color: black; border-width: 10px; margin-bottom: 1em; } .quiz legend { font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: bold; padding-left: 15px; padding-right: 15px; padding-top: 15px; } .quiz .hint { border: 2px solid gray; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; font-size:1.25rem; font-weight: bold; } .quiz label { display: block; font-size:1.25rem; line-height: 1.75em; } .quiz input[type="radio"] { margin-right: 10px; page-break-after: avoid; page-break-before: avoid; } .quiz input[type="submit"] { background: black; color: white; display: block; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.5rem; height: 2.5em; margin-top: 2em; text-transform: uppercase; width: 100%; } .quiz table { color: white; font-weight: bold; margin: 1em auto 2em auto; width: 100%; } .quiz td { padding: 5px 15px; text-align: left; width: 60px; } .quiz td.missing-label, .quiz td.missing-score { background: #CECBC2; } .quiz td.right-label, .quiz td.right-score { background: #74b559; } .quiz td.wrong-label, .quiz td.wrong-score { background: #D01F3C; }    var choices = "tim,tom,carl".split(","); var id = "test_quiz"; var question = "What is Tom\u0027s name?"; var hint = "Tom\u0027s name is tom..."; var answers = "2".split(",").map(Number); if (! (id in questions)){ questions[id] = []; } questions[id].push(new Question(question, choices, answers, hint));   var choices = "Cologne,Berlin,Hamburg".split(","); var id = "test_quiz"; var question = "What is the capital of Germany?"; var hint = "The capital is Berlin"; var answers = "2".split(",").map(Number); if (! (id in questions)){ questions[id] = []; } questions[id].push(new Question(question, choices, answers, hint));   var choices = "5,13,183,1".split(","); var id = "test_quiz"; var question = "Which number is larger 12?"; var hint = "Two numbers are larger!"; var answers = "2,3".split(",").map(Number); if (! (id in questions)){ questions[id] = []; } questions[id].push(new Question(question, choices, answers, hint));   var quiz = new Quiz("test_quiz", questions);   Click on the submit button to see the result.
